content: Those all sound terrifying and wonderful! I think it would also be creepy if the slime-parasite could be see writhing and probing violently out of a large gash in the Fissionators neck, as if looking for a new host to escape the uncontrolled radiation. This would also be a cool way to show its attack against the player; the parasite is trying to worm its way into the player's mouth, slowing player movement as it tries to break free from this radioactive prison
